mapper.sql: id, dis_get_user_id, dis_set_user_id, dis_amount, dis_pro_type, dis_note, dis_order_id, is_delete, add_time, update_time
mapper.select:
select
from dis_profit_record where id = #{id cType=INTEGER}

SELECT r.`dis_get_user_id`,r.`dis_set_user_id`,r.`dis_amount`,r.`dis_note`,r.`dis_order_id`,r.`add_time`, d.`dis_value` AS dis_pro_type ,u.dis_value as dis_user_type FROM `dis_profit_record` r LEFT JOIN `dis_dictionary` d ON d.`dis_type`=r.`dis_pro_type` AND d.`dis_code`='disProType' LEFT JOIN `dis_dictionary` u ON u.`dis_type`=r.`dis_user_type` AND u.`dis_code`='disUserType' where r.is_delete='N'
limit pageStart,pageSize
mapper.insert: insert into dis_profit_record (id, dis_get_user_id, dis_set_user_id, dis_amount, dis_pro_type, dis_note, dis_order_id, is_delete, add_time, update_time,dis_user_type) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{disGetUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disSetUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{disProType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disNote,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{disOrderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{disUserType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update dis_profit_record
dis_get_user_id = #{disGetUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

dis_amount = #{disAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
